newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH IMPORT DEPOSITS SHOULD BE SCRAPPED-MINISTER.
newsitem.headline: CZECH IMPORT DEPOSITS SHOULD BE SCRAPPED-MINISTER.

text.p: The Czech government's attempt to help the trade deficit by forcing importers to make deposits equal to 20 percent of the declared value of goods brought into the country, should be scrapped, the industry and trade minister said on Tuesday.

"I am sure that they don't make sense," Minister Karel Kuhnl told Reuters. "If the economic ministers agree that (the deposits) have no foundation (for continuing), I will propose that they are suspended."
